name: Retro Snake
description:
Retro Snake is exactly what its name claims it to be. It is a snake with retro futuristic design, however it isnt just another snake copy, this is a unique game. You have to bite your way through a lot of levels and beat a lot of puzzles. We are trying to deliver the retro feeling to you by making this game.Features:
  • Great looking retro design
  • Simple controls
  • Addicting gameplay
  • Huge replay value
  • Comes with Steam achievements

Can you beat all the levels or you already forgot how to play snake properly? Find out now!
